pageContext.claim: “So much Fake News about what is going on in the White House. Very calm and calculated with a big focus on open and fair trade with China, the coming North Korea meeting and, of course, the vicious gas attack in Syria. Feels great to have Bolton & Larry K on board.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump claims "very calm" White House when there is constant turnover in personnel and the White House staff says it is on edge because of Trump's sudden, lurching policy moves.
